title: WHO says Covid omicron variant detected in 38 countries, early data suggests it's more contagious than delta
content:
1. WHO says Covid omicron variant detected in 38 countries, early data suggests it's more contagious than delta  CNBC
  2. Vaccine makers right to plan for adjustments to COVID-19 shot, says WHO  Reuters
  3. Spreading rapidly in Europe, Omicron variant sparks a wave of new restrictions  Yahoo News
  4. Africa alerted the world to Omicron. Why are we now the pariahs?  The Guardian
  5. Did a collision of COVID and HIV forge the Omicron variant?  Los Angeles Times
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
WHO says Covid omicron variant detected in 38 countries, early data suggests it's more contagious than delta  CNBC
Vaccine makers right to plan for adjustments to COVID-19 shot, says WHO  Reuters

localize.title: WHO、コビット・オミクロンの変異体を38カ国で検出、初期のデータではデルタよりも感染力が強いと示唆
世卫组织称在38个国家检测到Covid omicron变体，早期数据表明它比delta更具传染性
世衛組織稱在38個國家檢測到Covid omicron變體，早期數據表明它比delta更具傳染性
